pr_title: [#9921] Don't load all courses again when deleting/archiving courses in InstructorCoursesPageComponent

timeline.message: Prevent multiple loading of courses after archiving/deleting courses in courses page
Organise various model types into one CourseModel
Fix deletion date not assigned after moving the course into recycle bin
Make sorting persistent after courses restored from archive
Refactor and return deletion timestamp from backend

timeline.bodyText:
My apologies. I thought we will return the updated course through the API.
Looks like your change is necessary. In addition, don't forget to add Java test for it.
timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.message: Add test to verify deletion timestamp has been set
